entries.journal_entry_description: Nawika has sent you to speak with Chief Kallaarac. Perhaps it is now that you have finally earned the trust of the Myyydril.
entries.journal_entry_title: Myyydril Trust - Return to Chief Kallaarac
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Speak with Chief Kallaarac. He resides in the Myyydril village.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Myyydril Trust - Return to Chief Kallaarac
